Description: Small ceramic bowl, unslipped and hand-modelled, containing several sun-dried fish and a strip of textile.
Curator's comments: Published: Wilson. Egyptian Food and Drink (Aylesburg 1988), 38. On fish and fishermen at Deir el-Medina, see Janssen, Village Varia (1997). chapter 4.
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Rev Greville John Chester
